category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_show_checkout_objects_on_exit
preference.preference_description: Specifies if the Find Checked Out Objects dialog box is displayed when exiting Teamcenter. The dialog box displays all objects checked out to the user in the database. Valid Values: True - The Find Checked Out Objects dialog box is displayed when exiting Teamcenter. False - The Find Checked Out Objects dialog box is not displayed when exiting Teamcenter.
